title: Chase Me, Watchdog
alternative_title: Chase me, Watchdog ; Romance wa Banken to ; ロマンスは番犬と
status: Chase me, Watchdog ; Romance wa Banken to ; ロマンスは番犬と
description:
Description :
        "His worst scandal...is me"Lay, a former soldier, is the bodyguard of Alex, who is one of the most popular actors praised for his chic style.However, Lay soon finds out that his master, often called as the "perfect prince", is nothing more than a bratty troublemaker.Lay must save and protect Alex's public image, but that mission includes one thing: to take care of Alex's sexual life as his 'stress reliever'...The most clingy top-secret love between a younger, super arrogant celebrity and his cool, tanned-skin pretty bodyguard begins!+
